entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
